price: Tir da zama misãli, mutãnen da suka ƙaryata game da ãyõyinMu, kuma kansu suka kasance sunã zãlunta.
arabic: سَآءَ مَثَلًا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَأَنفُسَهُمۡ كَانُواْ يَظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: sāa mathalan al-qawmu alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wa-anfusahum kānū yaẓlimūna
